text:
I’m looking for a way to manage subscriptions (e.g. subscribe or unsubscribe) *without* actual e-mail.
For example, when you get marketing e-mail, at the bottom, in the footer there is a *link* to manage subscriptions page. I’d like to embed that page into a webview inside an application. However, the trick is how to get that link?
On HubSpot Ideas Forum I see the same request (generate URL to access subscription preferences page) but it’s status is: _not currently planned_ since 2017! I guess this is not going to happen anytime soon, sadly.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Generate-the-URL-for-a-specific-contact-to-access-the/idi-p/22909>

Thus, as a workaround I have created Unsubscribe landing page which is connected to a workflow that can unsubscribe customer.

Yet, I’m wondering if there is a better, easier or preferred way to manage subscriptions? My goal is to have this embedded directly in mobile phone app.

Any help?
Hi everyone! Is there any group where can discuss on HubSpot bugs?

Hi everyone! I want to use BitBucket repository instead of GitHub one. Wonder how to set up integration with HubSpot properly? Can you please give an advise? I’ve found only <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/github-integration|this article> related to GitHub and nothing for BitBucket. Thank you so much in advance! :hearts:
Hello!, i need help to use events API and marketing API to extract client statics, anyone can help me?
:wave: Hi everyone! I need help on CRM API. how can I get all related contacts to the company while Company read API request. can someone help me please?
